titleStmt.title: The militia reform'd, or, An easy scheme of furnishing England with a constant land-force capable to prevent or to subdue any forein power, and to maintain perpetual quiet at home without endangering the public liberty.
titleStmt.author: Toland, John, 1670-1722.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Daniel Brown ... and Andrew Bell ...,
